snippet.title: Pool Panic | Aim & Shoot | Adult Swim Games
snippet.description:
The game of Pool Panic is quite simple. Just aim, shoot and PANIC!!!
 
The world's least realistic pool simulator, Pool Panic, releases on Switch and Windows PC via Steam on JULY 19, 2018.

For more info: poolpanic.com
Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/pool-panic-switch
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/522240/Pool_Panic/
